https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/er1uSB5iR0mV6LCAy0vAdWWGlZp.jpg When he becomes a father at the tender age of 14, Robbie's life quickly spirals out of control. Feeling angry and neglected by his own dad, he kick-starts a series of events that will catapult him at great speed into adulthood. A Boy Called Dad
